A "Green Printer" that uses recycled paper and soy-based ink to reduce its environmental impact.
A "Smart Printer" that automatically adjusts settings based on the type of document being printed.
A "Print-on-Demand" service that allows customers to order custom prints online and have them delivered within days.
A "Multifunction Printer" that combines printing, scanning, copying, and faxing capabilities into one device.
A "Collaborative Printing" platform that enables teams to work together on documents in real-time and share prints easily.
